text: Crackdown is an action-adventure video game from 2007. It was made by Realtime Worlds and published by Microsoft Game Studios for Xbox 360. Crackdown is set in a fictional city called Pacific City that has a few islands that are controlled by gangs. ==References== Category:2007 video games Category:Microsoft video games Category:Action-adventure games Category:Cooperative video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Open-world video games Category:Organized crime video games Category:Parkour video games Category:Third-person shooters Category:Vehicular combat games Category:Video games about police officers Category:Xbox 360 games Category:Xbox 360-only games Category:Xbox One games
title: Crackdown (video game)
